fields.content_en:
About Festival

KinoWeekend is a non-commercial art festival under time, technical and theme conditions. The main goal is to make up a script according to the given task, then shoot, cut and dub a short film within 72 hours! All the conditions (theme/ object/ film genre) will be announced in the first festival day and the participating works will be assessed by the professional jury and ordinary spectators.

  • about 200 active participants in St.Petersburg,
  • over 500 in the other cities involved in the project,
  • broad Internet-audience,
  • promising, young and creative participants

Читать лень - смотри!

Промо-ролик. Сделано в Перми


Festival participation is FREE OF CHARGE.
fields.title: About Festival
fields.content_ru:
О Фестивале

﻿КиноWeekend это арт-фестиваль в условиях временных, технических и тематических рамок. Задача участников разработать сценарий с учетом поставленных организаторами условий, отснять, озвучить и смонтировать короткометражный фильм за 72 часа! Условия (тема/локация/предмет/жанр) объявляются в первый фестивальный день. Работы участников оцениваются профессиональным жюри и зрителями. Участие в Фестивале БЕСПЛАТНОЕ.


24-28 мая состоится второй фестиваль федерального уровня одновременно в 4 городах России. Участвуют Санкт-Петербург, Москва, Казань, Нижний Новгород.


Читать лень - смотри!

Промо-ролик. Сделано в Перми

Формат фестиваля позволяет задействовать в проектах не только киношников, но и людей практически любой творческой профессии - музыканты, фотографы, гримеры, художники, модельеры - добро пожаловать!

fields.content_en:
Regulations of the Festival

The 2nd intercity movie-making marathon will take place on the 24th-28th of May 2012 in 6 Russian cities:


  • St-Petersburg
  • Moscow
  • Kazan
  • Nizhny Novgorod
  • Yekaterinburg
  • Perm

In opposition to the so-called mass culture creative persons always strive for individuality, wishing to originate their own, to express something that moves them personally and modern technologies and their availability give full play to this self-expression, and in case of our festival ̶ through cine images.

A competitive nature of the festival is tremendous drive to searching for new ideas and unordinary solutions, a specified theme is not to limit, but to awake imagination. Temporal conditions make teams fully fall into their project, concentrate themselves on their task and pass at breakneck speed all the stages of the movie-making process – from the idea to the finished film. Besides, each participant has a possibility to compare his work with the other and realize his strengths and weaknesses, what is of vital importance for every artist.


Such format of the festival let not only movie-makers, but also specialists of other creative professions participate in the projects. Musicians, photographs, make-up artists, designers etc. are warmly welcome!

A competitive nature of the festival is tremendous drive to searching for new ideas and unordinary solutions, a specified theme is not to limit, but to awake imagination. Temporal conditions make teams fully fall into their project, concentrate themselves on their task and pass at breakneck speed all the stages of the movie-making process – from the idea to the finished film. Besides, each participant has a possibility to compare his work with the other and realize his strengths and weaknesses, what is of vital importance for every artist.


Such format of the festival let not only movie-makers, but also specialists of other creative professions participate in the projects. Musicians, photographs, make-up artists, designers etc. are warmly welcome!
